mapper.select: SELECT ano, aname, aprice, adisprice, aphoto, aartist, num FROM (SELECT ano, aname, aprice, adisprice, aphoto, aartist, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT ano, aname, aprice, adisprice, aphoto, aartist FROM ALBUM_STORE ORDER BY ano ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT ano,arating,aphoto,aname,aartist,aprice,adis,adisprice,aimg,aintro,adetail,TO_CHAR(ardate,'YY-MM-DD') as aldate FROM ALBUM_STORE WHERE ano=#{ano}
